{{Wireless embedded system |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router |caption2 = |pp = https://www.acer.com/pl-pl/predator/networking/wi-fi/predator-connect-t7-wifi-7-mesh-router |ppalt = (PL) |sp = |dl = |fandom = |wikidevi = Acer_Predator_Connect_T7 |wikipedia = |ddwrtsupport = |openwrtsupport = |tomatosupport = |gargoylesupport = |brand = Acer |model = Predator Connect |submodelappend = yes |submodel = T7 (Mesh/5G CPE) |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = |page_start_date = 18 August 2024 |page_start_origon = https://wikidevi.wi-cat.ru/Acer_Predator_Connect_T7 |wlclass = BE11000 |series = |type = wireless router |sernum = |fcc_id = HLZT7 |cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ5322; |cpu1_cores = 4 |cpu1spd = 1.5 GHz |fla1chip = Macronix;MX35UF4GE4AD; |flash1size = 512 |ram1size = 1 GiB |ram1chip = Nanya;NT5AD512M16C4; |eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Qualcomm Atheros;QCA8334; |lan_ports = 2 |lan_speed = 1GbE |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 2.5GbE |exp_if_types = USB 3.0 (Type-C) |exp_usb_num = 1 |pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 3 |pwr_conn = barrel |flags = Wi-Fi 7, BW320 |addchip = |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax+be |is_manuf = No |fccapprovdate = 07/07/2024 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = B0D7QL1D8J |asin_country = GB |asin2 = B0D7MT7Y1L |asin_country2 = GB |countrymanuf = China |wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ5322; |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax/be |wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN6274; |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax/be }}
:• '''688''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11be 802.11be] (40MHz chan.) :• '''4323''' Mbps - 3SS 5.2GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11be 802.11be] (160Hz chan.) :• '''5764''' Mbps - 4SS 5.8GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11be 802.11be] (160MHz chan.) = '''''BE11000'' class'''
===Models=== :;[[Acer]] *[[Acer Predator Connect W6]] • AX7800 Tri-Band Wi-Fi 6E Router *[[Acer Predator Connect W6D]] • AX6000 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router *[[Acer Predator Connect W6x]] • AX6000 Dual-Band Wi-Fi 6 Router *[[Acer Predator Connect T7]] • BE11000 Wi-Fi 7 Mesh Router :''Predator Connect X7 Mesh • Predator Connect X7 5G CPE'' *[[Acer Predator Connect X5 5G CPE]] • Wi-Fi 6 5G CPE (MT7915A) *[[Acer Predator Connect D5 5G Dongle]] • 5G NR/LTE USB-C Adapter {{DoNotRemove|migration}}
